name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RLU.AI - Train AI Reply Like U - X/Twitter/FB

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mimics your writing style perfectly! Auto comment generator for X(Twitter), Facebook, LinkedIn, Reddit...Save time on social media.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RLU.AI - Reply Like You: Your Personal AI Reply Assistant

What is RLU.AI?
RLU.AI is a smart browser extension that helps you generate personalized responses on social media. Train the AI to write exactly like you and save hours on social media engagement!

Key Features:

1. Personalized Writing Style
• Train AI with your best-performing replies
• Maintain your unique voice and tone
• Consistent personality across all responses

2. Instant Response Generation
• One-click to generate multiple reply options
• Smart context understanding
• Instant reply box filling

3. Multi-Platform Support
Perfect Integration:
• X (Twitter) - Full support for tweets and threads
• Reddit - Works great with posts and comments
• LinkedIn - Professional response generation
• WordPress & Blog Comments - Engaging blog interactions

Smart Adaptation:
• Facebook - Best experience on post detail pages
• Instagram - Works on post captions and comments
• TikTok - Generate replies based on post descriptions
• YouTube - Comment on video descriptions and discussions

Note: For video platforms (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube), AI generates responses based on available text content, not video content.

Getting Started:
1. Install the extension
2. Click "Train Your AI" to add your writing examples
3. Look for the blue "AI Reply" button on the right side of your browser
   - The button appears on all web pages
   - You can drag and drop to reposition the button
   - Perfect for quick access while browsing
4. Visit any supported social platform
5. Click generate for instant personalized replies
6. Choose and post your perfect response

Quick Tips:
• Don't want to see the button on certain pages? Open the extension popup and toggle off "Show Button"
• The button can be dragged to any position on the screen
• For the best experience, keep the button visible on social media platforms you frequently use

Privacy & Security:
• Powered by Google Gemini AI
• No data storage on our servers
• No personal information collected
• Secure and reliable processing

Perfect For:
• Social Media Influencers
• Community Managers
• Content Creators
• Business Owners
• Active Social Media Users

Support:
We're committed to providing the best experience possible. If you encounter any bugs or issues, please email us immediately - we're here to help and will take immediate action to resolve them!

Transform your social media engagement today with RLU.AI - where efficiency meets authenticity!
